storyInfo: Amiya is attacked by the Confessarius Salus. Her powers are suppressed, and she falls unconscious. To save Amiya, the Doctor follows Salus and engages her, buying time for Logos and Ascalon to arrive.

attributes.text: You try to present a picture of calm.
The crowd is running. There are screams everywhere. They have hardly awakened from the last nightmare, before they are put into another great escape.
\nYou brace yourself against the wall. Someone ran into you, hard. Someone pretty darned strong.
\nIt all happened so quickly that you had no time to plan.
\nYou had expected the worst the moment you failed to stop the first drop of blood from seeping into that curious citizen.
Even worse is that you and Amiya have become separated by the stampeding crowd.
\nIt has been a long time since you last felt alone.
The screams drown out your voice. Nobody is listening to your commands.

attributes.content: Out of my way, out of my way!
attributes.name: Panicking Citizen

attributes.content: Th-The monsters are coming!
attributes.name: Crying Citizen

attributes.content: Get out of my way!
attributes.name: Panicking Citizen

attributes.content: Get away! There's blood on you! Like those monsters!
attributes.name: Crying Citizen

attributes.text: They are not your operators. They are just ordinary people.
\nReason is a luxury in the face of death.

attributes.content: Doctor!
Doctor, I'm here! Grab my hand!

attributes.text: You finally hear a familiar voice.
Amiya tries to force her way through the panicking crowd, and reaches out her hand.

attributes.content: Grab my hand, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: You know that you are the one whom Amiya cares most deeply about, always.
\nYou do not want to disappoint her.
\nYou penetrate the crowd and extend your hand with all your strength.
You realize who it is standing before you, a moment before your hands touch.

attributes.content: ...Why?
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.content: What should The King of Sarkaz look like?
attributes.name: Amiya?

attributes.options: You're not the one you once were.;......;I heard Logos's bone whistle.

attributes.content: The myriad souls still reject us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: However... a change has occurred. A part of us has left us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We must make a choice... we cannot remain stagnant.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.text: The Damazti approaches you, one step at a time.
\nYou can feel that the one-time King of the Sarkaz Court has changed. He is no longer an idle observer.
\nHe has begun moving forward.

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: I tried to imitate you, but I failed.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: A new Damazti...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is this your choice? To formally stand against us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We simply decided to try.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Hm—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Will we learn our meaning in battle against you, King of Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Where does our path lead?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Once... I asked the previous Damazti what I should do. He said I must overcome all doubt and hesitation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you still call me the King of Sarkaz after being reborn...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then go find the answer yourself. You won't get it from me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: She is always at your side, smiling. It almost makes you forget that she is the true King of Sarkaz.
\nDark Arts rumble. You find Amiya's presence downright imposing.
But still, you feel uneasy. Instincts tell you that this was no ordinary attack.
\nIn just a short period of time, you have learned that the Duke of Windermere, defender of the frontiers, is no pushover.
\nShe had her flagship break off from the fleet in order to save her daughter. This was an opportunity.
\nBut the rest of the fleet was not so far away. The tactical advantage in attacking a ducal vessel is limited... unless this was a decapitation operation.
No, killing a duke only makes her men angrier. There is more to Theresis's plan.
\nPlus, this ship is home to more than just the duke's elite guards; you and your friends are here.
The King of Sarkaz is here.
Suddenly, a pang of intense pain dazes you.

attributes.content: Oh, did I hurt you?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: That Ascalon woman is so annoying. Is she so persistent with everyone?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Amiya disengages from her battle with the Damazti and runs towards you. Arts converge on her fingertips, and her crown appears above her head.
The black Arts are shattered, and the black crown gone.
\nAmiya's Arts disintegrate in an instant, as though they had never existed.
\nHow could this be? It is the power of the King of Sarkaz!

attributes.content: H-How—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have long waited to rummage in your emotions and memories, little king.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: I thought the Revenant would cause you some difficulty, but you seem to be in better condition than I expected.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Cautus, no, Chimera.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: You are no Theresa.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: An eerie dark halo envelops Amiya. She tries to break through, but the Confessarius's cage does not budge.
\nThe cage grows smaller.
You look for someone who can help, a way to break Amiya free.
The Confessarius guards block any eyes that dare gaze upon this place.
\nThe enemy is more prepared than you thought.

attributes.content: Let go of me—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You had the fortune to be conferred the crown, but do you truly understand your power?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: We have studied the King of Sarkaz for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: Amiya's struggle grows feeble. The ancient, bane arts drain her strength.
\nHer knees buckle, and she falls to the ground.
\nShe lifts her hand, but not a ripple of Arts answer.

attributes.content: As for you...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: You feel the chilling gaze scanning you. Your heart is beating so fast, it threatens to escape your chest.
\nAnger and despair.
\nDeath extends its tendrils towards you.
\nYou clench your fist.

attributes.content: Get... away... from... Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh? Still mustering the power of the King of Sarkaz, even when surrounded by Confessarius witchcraft? I'm starting to miss Liz.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Well, this is a benefit to our experiments. I'll spare the Doctor's life, for now, and teach you to leverage your emotions.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: But I must make sure you behave before handing you over to the leader.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Great Damazti, that nasty woman is coming. May I count on you to deal with the rest?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Maybe she will temper us.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.text: You see Ascalon sprinting towards you.
\nCountless Confessarius guards stand in her way. They fall without a sound, then the figures of countless Damazti once again bury her.
\nThe Confessarius with blue hair lifts Amiya in her arms. The hull structure around you shatters, a staircase of earth and stone rises, and the wall of the canyon outside opens its gaping maw.
\nYou have seen Arts like this before. But she is no Gargoyle.

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Wherever they walk, the stone bridge trembles and shatters, and the cracks on the rock wall heal.
Ascalon tries to free herself from the Damazti tide, but the expressionless fragments seem endless.

attributes.content: Doctor! Stay where you are!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The most important thing is—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.text: The Confessarius and Amiya grow distant.
\nYou have heard it many times from many people. You are not built for fighting, so weak you could not even complete the beginner course for trainee operators.
Kal'tsit wanted you to stay in the rear, giving orders in safety.
\nBut Kal'tsit, equally thin and frail, stood before Theresis. You can still see the gaping wound when you close your eyes.
You should wait where you are. Ascalon needs time. You can work on a rescue plan once the battle has concluded.
\nA commander should learn to recognize when the situation is untenable.
But...
\nYour ears ring.
\nAmiya is your partner, your family.
\nYour sense and sensibility, your past and memories all cry out.
The smiles, the tears, the hard times... the brief joy.
\nThe hull breach is right beside you.
\nThe stone staircase is starting to fall apart.
\nYou put a numb foot forward.
You leap before the bridge shatters completely.
You run like you never have before, as the ground falls out from beneath where you just tread.
\nYour view is obscured by the white vapors that you exhale.
\nYour whole body trembles. You have never so lamented the frailness of your physique.
\nIt is not far. You can catch them. You can—
There is no time to think. The hole is within reach, but the ever-shifting rock wall could close upon it at any time.
\nA few steps further.
\nYou muster all the speed you have.
The next instant, you find yourself falling in infinite darkness.
How much time has passed?
\nWith your portable light, you see that countless hands have emerged from the ground, pulling at the passage, sewing it shut.
\nThe space continues to contract, pressing on you.
You do not know how far you must go, but you must not stop.
\nDown, down, down.
Your lungs sting. A light in the distance is your only hope.
Escaping the contracting hole, you find yourself hanging from an upside-down statue. From its eyes seep water falling from above, gleaming an eerie red in the light of magma.

attributes.options: Where is this place? What are these statues?

attributes.text: You recognize the statues as Djall.
\nThe Gargoyle shoulders the roof of the cave, feet burning in the magma.
\nThe Banshee curls up in the wilted thorns, bone whistle in hand.
The Wendigo tries to tear the rock wall apart with twisted hands, frightful visage roaring beneath a mask.
\nThe withered Vampire extends a hand from the lava.
\nA creature of unknown race holds its head in its hands, stone columns running through its eyes.

attributes.options: They look like they could come alive at any time.;Statues of the Sarkaz races?

attributes.content: You're tough, 'Doctor'. I respect that.

attributes.text: You feel a heavy blow, and a pair of baleful eyes.

attributes.content: Awake?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: How did you follow me with that feeble constitution of yours? I examined your body, but found nothing.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Well... not exactly nothing.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Your structure is... unusual. Different from all the samples I've seen. I would very much like to study you.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: In great detail. Unfortunately, this place has been abandoned a long time, and the equipment is far from adequate. It would not do to damage such a precious sample.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Perhaps I could bring you back to Londinium. But Theresis seems to pay particular attention to you...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: You look towards Amiya. Her consciousness seems hazy. Black Arts seep out from her, then fade into thin air the next instant.
\nHer brow twitches in pain. She is not in good shape.
\nYou have rarely seen this expression on the brave child's face, ever since you met in Chernobog.

attributes.content: Look, 'Doctor'. What is she looking at?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: She's trembling.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.options: What did you do to her?

attributes.content: 'The King of Sarkaz grants the promised land.' The little bunny simply got a taste of her own power.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.options: We don't need to be crossing swords. You want knowledge? Rhodes Island has it.;What do you want? We can talk about it.;Stop, or I'll drown you in lava.

attributes.content: Laughable attempt at flattery.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Meaningless negotiation.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: A trembling threat.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Painfully amusing, the way you hopelessly grasp at straws.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: No operators at your side. Nothing for you to command. Even the King of Sarkaz whom you served is leaving you.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: What can you do?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: She draws closer.
\nYou tighten the hand hidden behind your back.
\nAll you have is a sharp rock that you happened to pick up in the chaos.
Your reason tells you that it is useless. Perhaps you would have had a speck of hope if you were Blaze, Ascalon, or even Popukar...
\nYou feel regret, but even stronger is your determination.
\nThe pain in your hand keeps you conscious.
Patience. Wait for her to draw closer...

attributes.content: I've asked the leader many times: why does power so often end up in the hands of the ordinary?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: What have these forgotten Kings of Sarkaz given us, besides a life of exile and persecution?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Will you, 'Doctor', be one of the causes of another round of suffering?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.options: You have questions, but this is not the time or place to answer them.;Remove the spell on Amiya, and I'll do my best to answer.;I have the same questions, but hurting Amiya is not the answer.

attributes.content: I appreciate your intelligence, but there has never been a shortage of smart people.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: There is nothing that can compare to this opportunity, what we have pursued for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: If she can force the crown upon the head of this little bunny—
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Then it can be forced out.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.options: You want to steal Amiya's crown!

attributes.content: Steal? No, this crown is not a ring lying on the battlefield for the taking.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: You'll never understand.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: The blue-haired Confessarius turns towards Amiya.
\nThis might be your chance. You make the calculations. With your full strength, perhaps...

attributes.content: What's this? A rock?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: You feel your internal organs twitch and convulse. The taste of rust fills your mouth.
\nOne little push from the Confessarius, and your right hand loses all sensation.
Bones have broken.
\nWincing at the intense pain, you force yourself to lunge forward but she lithely dodges.
\nYou fall in front of Amiya, blocking the blue-haired Confessarius's malicious gaze.

attributes.content: How touching, putting yourself in front of her. But meaningless.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: If you're so obsessed, I have a better way to deal with you.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Perhaps that brain beneath the hood holds secrets beneficial to our experiments.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: There. Don't try to resist.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Share your memories with me—
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: You can feel the Confessarius's breathing.
\nA numbing sensation filled with ancient witchcraft moves towards the top of your head.

attributes.content: What? What could possibly repel a Confessarius's...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: The King of Sarkaz? But her mind should have been shackled...
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: A black vortex rises from behind you.
\nAmiya whispers at its center.
\nThe black crown trembles with agitation.

attributes.content: *Ancient Sarkaz Language*
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The shackles of myriad souls are not so easily broken. She remains amidst the myriad souls.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: She has chosen to protect you subconsciously. Hah.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Wait... That's not all?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Her connection with the crown is growing?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: 'The crown... remember... souls...'
Is that Amiya's voice?
\nYou get a feeling...
\nShe is growing more distant by the second, to a place that you cannot reach—
You try to grab Amiya. The black vortex roils between you, and a great force tries to push you away.
\nYou dig your one good hand into the dirt, dragging the rest of your hide along, towards the girl lying on the ground.

attributes.content: Ah, such intense emotions.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Looks like Theresa's choice was not entirely one of desperation, after all.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: Just a little further—

attributes.content: Why don't we cut straight to the chase, then? I hope this won't break your little head. That would be a shame.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: The Confessarii left more than statues in this cavern.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: *Sarkaz incantation*
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: You touch her.
The black vortex shatters and vanishes. You grab Amiya's hand.
Amiya has grown up, but her hands still feel small and frail.
\nHer palm is filled with sweat.
\nYou do not know if the Confessarius's curse worked, or if this was the result of Amiya's effort and yours.

attributes.content: Tsk—
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: Blood sprays from the Confessarius's neck.
Ascalon walks towards you, casting not another glance at the fallen Confessarius.

attributes.content: That was reckless, Doctor. If I didn't run into—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Look out.

attributes.text: Blood explodes, and a sanguine shockwave sweeps towards you.
\nA figure stands in front of you, arriving in the nick of time.

attributes.content: Vampire Arts... what have you done to your bloodline?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Hard to imagine that you're related to Shining.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The amount of grief that your degeneration has caused that fine girl...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*—Lord of the Banshees.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: I'm impressed. It couldn't have been easy to get here.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: The Confessarius puts her hand on her neck wound. The blood that sprayed from it is slowly flowing back.

attributes.content: I should have been more careful, knowing that the sitting Lord of the Banshees is rather rebellious.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: You're more dangerous than we expected.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Urgent situation. Interrogation out of the question. Kill her and leave.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: You see Logos's cold expression, and the incantation that obediently emerges from his tongue.
\nBut you do not see Salus's fear, anger, any expression you might expect to see on one facing her own death.
\nYou see only curiosity.

attributes.content: This is the Lord of the Banshees? The Elegiac Court? Indeed, these incantations are no less refined than that of your famous mother.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: But... did you know?
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.content: Such refined runes, refined Arts... they are far from the Sarkaz's roots.
attributes.name: Salus

attributes.text: She is backing up.
\nBehind her—
\nThe statue of a Banshee towers above.

attributes.content: Ascalon!
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: An instant before everything went black, you saw Ascalon grab Amiya, while Logos shielded you.
\nYou saw the statue come to life.
\nYou saw the Confessarius's eyes narrow, and saw her ring the death knell first.

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: We've left the cave. Ascalon is scouting the area.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Your right forearm is broken. I made a makeshift splint, but I'm no medic.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Still unconscious. The Confessarius said something to the effect of 'trapped in the myriad souls', but...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: She's alive, at least.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.text: You turn around to see the Cautus girl lying peacefully under a tree, as if she is merely sleeping.

attributes.content: I can understand Ascalon's objection to your methods. She's concerned for more than just your safety.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: But it's also true that you bought us time. The Confessarius and Amiya would be behind Londinium's walls by now, if not for your efforts.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: She got away.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Rock and earth, blood... and the wail of the Banshee.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Is this the Sarkaz that the Confessarii want? One so obsessed with bloodline and witchcraft?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: Their target is the King of Sarkaz.
We must inform Kal'tsit and Shining.

attributes.content: ...Wait.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: The vapor around us...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: ...This can't be. Careful, Doctor. We may still be inside the enemy's trap.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.options: What is it?;I don't often see that look on your face.

attributes.content: This is not Victoria.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: This is the Convallis of the Banshees.
attributes.name: Logos
